changeSet.author: Vikas
changeSet.createView: SELECT geo.geographic_name, count(usr.id),geo.id FROM moyadev.geographic_data geo INNER JOIN moyadev.USER usr ON usr.state=geo.id GROUP BY geo.id

changeSet.author: Vikas
changeSet.createView: SELECT geo.geographic_name, count(usr.id),geo.id FROM moyadev.geographic_data geo INNER JOIN moyadev.USER usr ON usr.district=geo.id GROUP BY geo.id

changeSet.author: Vikas
changeSet.createView: SELECT geo.geographic_name, count(youth.id),geo.id FROM moyadev.geographic_data geo INNER JOIN moyadev.youth_enrollment youth ON youth.state=geo.id GROUP BY geo.id

changeSet.author: Vikas
changeSet.createView: SELECT geo.geographic_name, count(youth.id),geo.id FROM moyadev.geographic_data geo INNER JOIN moyadev.youth_enrollment youth ON youth.district=geo.id GROUP BY geo.id
